overview: Their only sin is unconventional love. But however mismatched these couples, they come together in a sensual, erotic coupling that is beyond sexy! This is the revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender; when age becomes just a number and true feelings are revealed in the most seductive and sultry way.
tagline: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender.
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 30
